text: This is my niece Sarah. She is 15 years old. He is with her dog Keyush. Also in the picture there is my dog, Nook as well
My dog Nook with his friend Keyush and Sherpa. They are siting on the beach. We used to go to the beach every weekend during autumn
It is me, John. I am with my niece Sarah. Our dogs are with us. We are in the beach
This is me standing and playing with my dog Nook. We are in the beach. It is a sunny day
Nook in my car. I am driving. We are going to the beach. Nook loves to go to the beach. I used to own a van
I, my daughter, Chloé and my mother. We are in the same van. Our dogs are with us. I am driving. We are going to the beach
Me and My daughter Chloé. We are in a van
This is my van. It is a Volkswagen. Bright red. I used to go to the beach with my family and dogs
Christmas 2019. My dog nook sitting in front of the Christmas tree. We used to celebrate Christmas with my family
My dad! Jack. Wearing blue polo shirt. He used to love eating ice cream.
